title: The Concorde ... Airport '79
plotSummary: Concorde pilots must save the passengers when the plane is attacked by a wealthy industrialist.

manMadeDisasters.plotSummary: Two feuding firefighter brothers investigate a series of arson attacks in Chicago.

manMadeDisasters.plotSummary: An oil platform collapse in the North Sea triggers a potential environmental disaster.

A series of devastating earthquakes threatens to tear the Western United States apart.

naturalDisasters.plotSummary: Residents of a small town have only 13 minutes to find shelter before a massive tornado strikes.

airplaneDisasters.plotSummary: A flight attendant must pilot a 747 after it collides with a small plane.

airplaneDisasters.title: Airspeed
airplaneDisasters.plotSummary: A teenage girl must land a business jet after the crew is incapacitated.

atomicAge.plotSummary: A runaway train carrying nuclear weapons threatens a major city.

atomicAge.plotSummary: A tornado threatens a nuclear power plant, risking a catastrophic meltdown.

atomicAge.title: Control
atomicAge.plotSummary: A scientist races against time to prevent a nuclear disaster.

epidemicsAndPandemics.plotSummary: Scientists race to contain a deadly extraterrestrial microorganism.

epidemicsAndPandemics.plotSummary: Passengers on a train are exposed to a deadly plague and quarantined.

shipwrecks.plotSummary: A fictional account of the sinking of the Titanic's sister ship during World War I.
